articles.description: Manchester City's dreams of winning a second successive Treble were left in tatters by Real Madrid, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: 'Man City's Treble dreams left in tatters by Real'

articles.description: Mikel Arteta says he must show his Arsenal side "support and love" after they were knocked out in the Champions League.
articles.title: Arsenal need 'support and love' after exit - Arteta
How City of Light changed the Olympics

articles.description: Real Madrid beat Manchester City 4-3 on penalties to reach the semi-finals of the Champions League.
articles.title: Man City knocked out of Champions League by Real Madrid

articles.description: Toronto Raptors forward Jontay Porter is given a lifetime ban by the NBA for breaching the league's betting rules.
articles.title: Jontay Porter: Toronto Raptors forward given lifetime NBA ban for breaching betting rules

articles.description: Rafael Nadal's latest injury comeback - in what could be his final season before retirement - ends with a second-round defeat at the Barcelona Open.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal's comeback at Barcelona Open ended by Alex de Minaur

articles.description: Rangers suffer a second blow to their Scottish Premiership title hopes within three days as they are held to a goalless draw away to Dundee.
articles.title: Blunt Rangers' title bid hit again in Dundee draw

articles.description: An Italian court orders Serie A club Juventus to pay their former striker Cristiano Ronaldo £8.3m in wages owed.
articles.title: Juventus ordered to pay Ronaldo £8.3m in wages owed

articles.description: The USA announce a star-studded basketball squad for Paris 2024 - with LeBron James, Kevin Durant and Stephen Curry included.
articles.title: Olympics 2024: Stephen Curry, Kevin Durant and Lebron James in USA team

articles.description: Jofra Archer says he will struggle to cope with any more injury problems, saying: "I don't know if I've got another stop-start year in me."
articles.title: England's Archer wary of 'another stop-start year'
